mc.*, msi.id as storeId, msi.shop_name as shopName, msi.default_head as defaultHead, mcp.id as pictureId, mcp.picture_path as picturePath, mcr.id as receiveId, mcr.usage_state as usageState, mcr.date_time as dateTime mcr.award_code as awardCode
